Articles.Content:
I have been playing the game for a long time now and have not discovered an issue up until this point.

I have a number of mods installed including:

Airplane plus, BD armoury, KAS, KIS, Module manager and Kerbal Konstructs.

The problem is when I enter the astronaut complex, I am not able to leave. Everything else in the game runs perfectly fine but once I enter the Astronaut complex, I cannot leave.

If anyone is able to help me I would very much appreciate it. I have tried to look this problem up on the forum but have not been able to find anything relevant yet.

Thanks!

I have never looked at them before, how do i find them in my KSP folder/post them here?

 

Edited November 9, 2019 by Roboss 54
